body:
Hi!  I´ve been trying to run an energy simulation of an office (using natural ventilation) with the "set ep air flow" component, but since i updated my honybee version, the "run energy simulation" component fails to run the IDF. The balloon message says : 1. The simulation has not run correctly because of this severe error: 
** Severe ** Out of range value Numeric Field#3 (Effective Angle), value=360.00000, range={>=0.0 and <360.0}, in ZONEVENTILATION:WINDANDSTACKOPENAREA=ZONE_0NATVENT2 How could i solve this problem? Thank you all for your attention!
topic: Problem with set ep airflow component
